summary: This is a brief internal email or memo dated July 26, 2019, providing an update on Jeffrey Epstein's status regarding suicide watch and psychological observation while in custody. It indicates he was not on suicide watch but was under psychological observation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the status update, identified by his inmate number P76318-054, regarding his suicide watch and psychological observation status while in custody.

events.title: Epstein Custody Status Update
events.description: An internal update on Jeffrey Epstein's status in custody, noting he was not on suicide watch but was under psychological observation.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 26, 2019, shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
It states Jeffrey Epstein (inmate P76318-054) was not on suicide watch at the time of the update.
It states Jeffrey Epstein was under psychological observation at the time of the update.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and appears to be an internal communication.
